lines.text: "Do you think I have a successful business "by providing information about my sources? "You're fine."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As long you won't tell anyone where you gave this ring."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try to do a flower crown, see if she wants a flower crown.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: (gasps) Quickly Druidcraft a flower crown and slide it across the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes it and goes, "You've certainly helped "hobble some bad folk."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll look at the imps. Are they surprised?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I look up at them, I'm like: You're next.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway, our business is concluded, "unless you want something else."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, pleasure doing business with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, so we'll hook up with Umagorn and make--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there anything that you'd like to do while you rest or move on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm probably going to meditate and have a quick communion with the Wildmother about precisely what is the ritual that I'm to enact.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you wish me to feed just three of these into the-- into the magma?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: May I give you all of it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quietly I find a quiet space and I take everything in the box and as close as I can get to the heat before it really hurts, and I--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then I'll take a little damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To what full nature, you don't understand, but you remember the dream you had, the vision you had, and a sense of peace and accomplishment washes over you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you take the tongs and release them one by one, they are cool to the touch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have five of them now? Or just one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like a potato that's been left in the pantry too long and has grown the various roots that stretch out, but made of purple crystal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to gather them up and take them back to the others.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does anyone else wish to do anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it about midday at this point after our shenanigans?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say at this point it's getting close to night.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are businesses still open out there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are in the forge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, I was reading all the shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I skipped ahead for the purposes of, you know-- not too much would've happened there anyway and I want to get us to a point of--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could I retroactively have dived into-- kept an eye out for a paper store on the way out, to get my supplies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they have supplies, there are arcane practitioners.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not impatient, either. I just want to be able to help and not hinder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take a look at it, and you know, peruse the pages a bit, if it's not for you, check with the rest of the group and see if they'd like it, but I think it's meant for you, perhaps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hand it over to him, and then I head off to start transcribing some spells.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got a bottle of whiskey in Bazzoxan in case Nott flew off the handle, that we haven't we touched, if anybody wants to, you know, celebrate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to be alone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Even if I'm not drinking, I'm still here with you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm drinking with you in spirit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's fine, I take a big swing and then hand it to Reani.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I take a big swig as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just feeling so good, it's okay, she's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fantas-- I mean, to be fair, you did very well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would've been better if I had that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was a sign, we needed to get out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would've gotten that wand, but it's all right.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Are you sure you don't want a drink?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you still have that note that we took from the house?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want to play crosswords and shit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know what that note is?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: (gasps) Oh! Oh! I didn't write it down, but that's the one asshole, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that, what is that?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: They're these mean as a family of criminals and they've been terrorizing Uthodurn, and they've been-- they've been roughing up the patrons, and I've been fighting them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we've heard of the Jagentoths.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think they ran amok in Rosohna? No, they've run amok, I've got it written down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've got it in your notes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you know about them, Reani?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: These weren't the ones that brought back-- that go to the Savalirwoods, were they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, they hail from somewhere south of there, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not the ruins of Molaesmyr, but they do occasionally attempt to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a roll for this? So I'm not searching through my notes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was going to see if you wanted to find it and have that epiphany, as the note taker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know it's in here, I know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: God, that's so hard to find anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was over a year ago.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was over a year ago?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They fucked with Lorenzo and shit, right? Didn't they work with him? They were the rival family that hired Lorenzo and the Iron Fucks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They were the ones that were shipping the relics, including the first orb of Uk'otoa that you found.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, you got a super villain.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: They want me so dead, but I'm going to fight 'em.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Wait, will you give me one more present?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Will you come back to visit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, why else do you think I spent 2000 gold on that teleportation circle?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Umi doesn't count because he's busy all the time, and I'm busy all the time, and Fen doesn't count anymore, but I like you guys.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Before all of them leave, I want to craft new flower crowns for them.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I promised myself I wouldn't cry, you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have one last thing I'd like to do with Caleb, also, if you've got a second.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's this look like to you? What do you see?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A crystal very similar in hue to you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you get any sense of it, what it might be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which means this might be a little out of your depth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I know what it is anyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's the head of a hero.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I won't bother you again, good luck with that thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do recall that there are two parts to that vision.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If Caleb gave me that book, and it was a two-day travel back to the kiln, could I say that I've spent most of the trip reading it and trying to absorb its contents, and you know, just spending time with it? As part of an effort, not--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I could say you can begin to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it takes a while to read through.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm also not great at reading on horseback.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you're going through the mountains.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I also try to take Beau up on some of her morning exercises on the way?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does not go well in the beginning, but the effort is what counts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I go off into my own corner and try to trace like a circle in the soil and...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like on the outside of the sanctum?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, just make my own little space, circle, and sit in the soil, and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can find a similar place, clear it out, and attempt your own.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And just silently try to talk to the Wildmother, if she's listening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Will you walk my lands, swim my shores, "and guide my children as one of my own?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone else wish to do anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I'm going to find Reani.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Love, Jester and the Traveler." I'm going to put that note inside my book of pastry recipes that I bought, and I'm going to give it to Reani, because I know you love how to cook and bake and all of the wonderful things.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Bolstered by a little bit of whiskey, I want to shuffle over to Beau, and I want to like-- reminiscent of hot boy Essek-- looking down at the floor, I just want to Druidcraft a little rose, and I'll slide it over, like, I'm not-- I'm not good at this, but you said that you wanted to come back and visit, and you spent a lot of money to come see me, (quietly) so I thought that I--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab the back of her neck and I kiss her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just kind of look over at Jester.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think Nott and I are watching this at this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we'll give you some privacy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we'll get out of the room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everywhere we go. How does she do that? Everywhere we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys go ahead and take a walk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just grab Reani by the hip, pull her in as we walk away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What else is there to say?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know you're in here, I saw you bamf out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have not been drinking so much the last couple days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not-- I mean, we've been traveling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We just haven't been in a fight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe it's okay if you are, but maybe it's okay if you stop, or drink less.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we having this conversation right now? Listen, I-- (sighs) All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'm fine giving it up, as long as you people can find me something else that can protect me as much as it does.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How can you protect us if you are not protecting yourself?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just worry that I won't be able-- I won't be brave without it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I'll probably be scrambling one less time a day, you know? Maybe it'll take some time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I really wish I could see you right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I understand, I get that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'm sorry if I disappoint you again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe we both are messes, but at least we're messes together.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While he can't see me, I'm going to take a small sip of whiskey, and slowly wipe my mouth, and then say, I'll try to make you proud.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think Caleb is going crazy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just rolled a 28 perception, 27 perception roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would I have known that Caleb was talking to Nott?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not in the same chamber, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no, they're-- just watching, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were far enough away I wouldn't have heard you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have different rooms in the sanctum.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm sorry, I had assumed it was private time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say that you could maybe have heard Caleb talking and like, maybe looked in and saw nothing, I would say that you probably--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been trying to sit and listen as much as possible, it's kind of my-- but yeah-- I just rolled something because I was curious what my perception might've been.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather there's probably a conversation going on, but you haven't looked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, because he's just talking to himself so much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think he's talking to Nott.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that makes so much more sense.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll be figuring out your Traveler Con soon enough.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to be really cool, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You got a good crew for it, so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know, he is looking a little weird though, isn't he?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no, no, I have some in my bag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In lots of places, and your figure is taunting a big ancient white dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's done! "By the might of the Allhammer, it's fucking done!" You all come to consciousness abruptly, except for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see that Deilin is asleep off to the side, curled in the corner, and there is a sleepless, kind of manic-looking Umagorn holding a single blade.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the thick longsword, almost broadsword type of blade length with runes in a groove down the center, the metal silver with a slight blue shimmer to it, akin to the coloration of iceflex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The lines have been continued to almost have this marbled look to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all stumble out in your various states, no Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take a little while, there's no sign of him on the inside of the sanctum.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go check outside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see snow, soft powder, and there's a bit of a dome where you guys had had your previous conversation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I go up and look at it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like someone had layered seaweed after seaweed after seaweed, and it's tangled and messed like a net, and it is frozen solid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is this doing out here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Going to take one of the purple crystals, and try and push it into the frozen seaweed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It pushes in. It's like ice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we-- what is it? What's in here? Is Fjord in here?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it vaguely Fjord-shaped? Is it like a Pompeii body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's like a dome, about six and a half, seven feet wide, and it's like a weird button shape.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hello? Are you in here? Can you hear us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Start pulling it aside, maybe if we bring the sword--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you break a piece off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually you pull through, and you find flesh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's get him out of here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pull him out, pull him out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should take his clothes off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why should we take his clothes off?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we probably should just take the clothes off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you take off Fjord's clothes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Fjord come awake and sit up out of the mass of tendrils.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you cold? Do you want to get inside?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What were you doing in a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What happened? Do you like bread?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's a force of habit, I'm sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Freaked me out for a second.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the last thing you remember?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I came outside to meditate, in the way that Caduceus showed me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, did you Captain America Fjord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not an overt, but like, he looks a little-- where once there was a scrawny Fjord is slightly less scrawny.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you gain muscle that quickly from our two workouts?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm pretty sore, actually, all over.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I punch him in the arm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little more resistance than you're used to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I have to Flurry of Blows him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a gift for you inside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have a nice cup of tea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: God, it's fucking cold out here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, we've been telling you to come inside, Fjord. Come inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've been out here all night?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you do this to yourself?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kind of look around and take stock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the nest-like circular layer of seaweed around you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you asking me if I built a nest of--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That seems to be the obvious answer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Similar to the one that I heard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I said yes, but that was...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, just think about something and do something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Make your falchion appear or something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't have my-- I'll try to summon the falchion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make water shoot from your hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you trying to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Make water shoot from his hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Water does not shoot from your hands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try to disguise your face like you used to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as his entire body shimmers into a larger, thicker version of Nott the Brave.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay, what else, okay, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try it, try it, try it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look out over the cliff side, and I will look at Nott and say, (Texan accent) Eldritch Blast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Energy gathers within his palm, but as opposed to the dull sickly green coloration, this has a deeper verdant tint to it as it fires out, (imitating impacts) two blasts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm really proud of you, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking seaweed wraps are the shit! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I spent all night working on this."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck, who took my shirt off?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Didn't know if we needed to resuscitate you and rub your chest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Umagorn's like, "Aye, it is," and he holds it up, and you can see the blade is beautiful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fjord, do you want to hold it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who else here is going to use a sword?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You do need a new sword.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is what we're here for.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There are no accidents, correct, Caduceus?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a big piece of paper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we'll end tonight's episode.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know it went a little long, but I feel like it was worth it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll pick up from there in two weeks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because we got a week off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't cry; it's not over! It's not the end.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I'm going to cry so much tonight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have to keep hanging out with us.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: (laughter) I'll just live under the table. It's fine.
